title: Katie Price debuts new cornrow hairdo similar to I'm A Celeb look
text:
Katie Price showed off her cornrow hairstyle ahead of Celebrity SAS (Picture: Backgrid)

Katie Price has taken some time out from renovating her ‘mucky mansion’ and filming for her YouTube channel to stop by the salon – and fans can’t help noticing there’s something familiar about her new ‘do.

The former glamour model, 41, stepped out with her hair in cornrows this week and it was eerily like we were back in 2004 all over again as it looked just like her I’m A Celebrity… Get Me Out Of Here look.

Katie had chosen the braided ‘do for her time in the jungle as it was a low-maintenance look that wouldn’t need too much upkeep with the limited shower facilities in the camp.

The hairdo went down so well the first time around it netted her a husband in the form of Peter Andre, with the couple marrying a year after the show and having children Junior and Princess Andre together before separating in 2009.

Advertisement

Advertisement

15 years – and two more husbands – down the line, Katie’s gone back to her cornrow hair and showed off her new look while out and about near her home.

She was seen wearing a grey Ellesse tracksuits with accents of her favourite colour, pink, as she strolled down country lanes in Worthing.

Katie Price first rocked cornrows in the jungle in 2004 (Picture: Rex)

Katie decided on the low-maintenance hairdo to take on the gruelling tasks in Celebrity SAS (Picture: BACKGRID)

She looked pretty pleased with her new ‘do (Picture: BACKGRID)

The mother of five is set to take part in Channel 4’s SAS Celebrity Who Dares Wins, and has been training for the gruelling show.

Contestants will be given military training by Ant Middleton and tested on their endurance with previous shows having seen the recruits fight each other and climb mountains among other difficult tasks.

Katie hasn’t had an easy ride over the past few years, with relationship and financial dramas as well as driving bans to contend with, and is said to be hoping the show will make the public ‘fall in love’ with her again.

We can’t wait to see how she does – either way, she’s got the hair for it.

description: Katie Price reminded fans of her 2004 I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here look with her new cornrow hairstyle ahead of Celebrity SAS.
